growth.title: Scale Your Business
growth.description: Add unlimited users, manage more vehicles, and expand your operations without limits.

efficiency.title: Improve Efficiency
efficiency.description: Streamline workflows with advanced features like inventory management, photo documentation, and approval systems.

insights.title: Better Insights
insights.description: Make data-driven decisions with advanced analytics, detailed reports, and export capabilities.

billing.question: How does billing work?
billing.answer: Plans are billed annually. You can upgrade or downgrade at any time, and changes will be reflected in your next billing cycle.

cancellation.question: Can I cancel anytime?
cancellation.answer: Yes, you can cancel your subscription at any time. You'll continue to have access until the end of your current billing period.

support.question: What support do I get?
support.answer: All plans include email support. Professional plan includes priority support with faster response times and dedicated assistance.

contact.title: Need Help Choosing?
contact.description: Our team is here to help you find the perfect plan for your garage.

welcome.title: Welcome to OpAuto Solo!
welcome.description: Let's take a quick tour of your garage management system. This tour will help you get started with the essential features.

dashboard.title: Your Dashboard
dashboard.description: This is your command center. Monitor today's appointments, active jobs, and key metrics at a glance.

addCar.title: Add Your First Car
addCar.description: Start by registering vehicles. Click here to add customer cars with details like make, model, and license plate.

maintenance.title: Maintenance Tracking
maintenance.description: Track all service jobs here. Create new jobs, update status, and manage repairs efficiently.

invoicing.title: Cash Invoicing
invoicing.description: Generate invoices for completed services. Simple cash-based billing for your customers.

notifications.title: Browser Notifications
notifications.description: Stay updated with browser notifications for new jobs and important updates.

upgrade.title: Ready to Grow?
upgrade.description: Upgrade to Starter for multi-user access, email notifications, and approval workflows. Or go Professional for inventory management and advanced features!

welcome.title: Welcome to OpAuto Starter!
welcome.description: You've unlocked powerful team collaboration features. Let's explore what's new for your growing garage.

dashboard.title: Enhanced Dashboard
dashboard.description: Your dashboard now shows team activities, approval requests, and collaborative workflows.

multiUser.title: Team Management
multiUser.description: Create staff accounts for your mechanics and assistants. Each member gets their own login and access.

approvals.title: Approval Workflows
approvals.description: Staff can request approval for parts and services. You review and approve from this section.

emailNotifications.title: Email Notifications
emailNotifications.description: Configure email alerts for job completions, approvals, and important updates.

customerHistory.title: Customer History
customerHistory.description: Access complete service history for each customer. Build better relationships with detailed records.

reports.title: Business Reports
reports.description: View revenue reports, service analytics, and performance metrics to make data-driven decisions.

upgradePro.title: Go Professional
upgradePro.description: Upgrade to Professional for unlimited users, inventory management, SMS notifications, and advanced reporting!

welcome.title: Welcome to OpAuto Professional!
welcome.description: You have full access to all features. Let's explore the advanced capabilities of your Professional plan.

dashboard.title: Professional Dashboard
dashboard.description: Your complete command center with unlimited scale, advanced analytics, and full feature access.

inventory.title: Inventory Management
inventory.description: Track parts, manage stock levels, and monitor supplier orders. Full inventory control at your fingertips.

photoDocs.title: Photo Documentation
photoDocs.description: Upload before/after photos, document repairs, and provide visual evidence to customers.

advancedReports.title: Advanced Analytics
advancedReports.description: Access detailed reports, predictive analytics, and business intelligence tools for strategic planning.

smsNotifications.title: SMS Notifications
smsNotifications.description: Send SMS alerts to customers and staff. Keep everyone informed in real-time.

dataExport.title: Data Export
dataExport.description: Export your data in various formats for accounting, analysis, or backup purposes.

unlimitedFeatures.title: Unlimited Everything!
unlimitedFeatures.description: Enjoy unlimited users, cars, service bays, and all premium features. Scale your garage without limits!

welcome.title: Welcome to OpAuto!
welcome.description: Let's get you familiar with your workspace. This quick tour will show you the essential features you'll use daily.

dashboard.title: Your Dashboard
dashboard.description: See your assigned jobs, today's schedule, and active tasks at a glance.

maintenance.title: Maintenance Jobs
maintenance.description: View and update service jobs. Track your work progress and mark tasks as complete.

approvalRequest.title: Request Approvals
approvalRequest.description: Need to purchase parts? Request approval from the owner using this button.

profile.title: Your Profile
profile.description: Update your personal information and preferences here. You're all set!

photoUpload.title: Photo Documentation
photoUpload.description: Upload photos of repairs and issues. Visual documentation helps communicate with customers.
